NGUYEN MANH TRUONG 
(JOHN NGUYEN) 
E-COMMERCE LOGISTICS PROFESSIONAL 
Vietnamese | (+84) 983190831 | johnnguyen3636@gmail.com 
Summary 
John is an E-commerce logistics professional with 6+ years of working experiences in the industry across South East Asia. 
He is expert in Logistics Management including Warehousing, Own-Fleet Delivery, Third Party Logistics and On-demand 
Logistics. Moreover, John has worked with different systems (from startup to big corporation), and with different points of 
view (from client to service provider to middle-man). He is able to drive the business in both operation and sales toward 
company targeted goals. 
AREAS OF EXPERTISE: 
•  Experience with all Logistics aspect from warehousing to delivery, especially within E-commerce industry. 
• Functionally strong experience on Order Managing System, Warehouse Inventory Master, Routing Systems and other 
supportive system. 
• Projecting PnL and setup strategic planning 
• Forecast Demand and Supply and balance it through peak time 
• Establishing new entity and mange it 
Work History 
Mar 2018 - Present 
Vietnam Country Manager 
DOSTAVISTA GLOBAL 
Establish MrSpeedy Vietnam and operate it from Day 1: including localizing product to fit with 
Vietnam situation, recruitment of team, support technical and legal setup, prepare PnL and 
strategic planning… Also, as the business starts, manage both sales and operation to ensure the 
demand and supply matched.   
May 2016 – Feb 2018 
Vietnam Country Manager 
SENDIT AISA 
Set up a new branch in Vietnam specialized in E-commerce Logistics Solution including 2-stage 
and on-demand service. Being responsible for all activities of the company including working with 
Legal to set up company in Vietnam, recruiting employees, preparing business plan for investors, 
doing market research, performing initial sale… 
Dec 2015 – May 2016 
Head Of Transportation 
ACOMMERCE ASIA 
Responsible for all transportation activities of aCommerce Thailand including managing Third 
Party Logistics companies (3PLs) and Own Fleet delivery. Establish, develop and managing good 
relationship with 3PLs; Manage own fleet delivery with good routing for both motorbikes and 
trucks; Enable Same Day Delivery for Bangkok, Next Daly Delivery for nationwide; Support 
Warehouse on new warehouse layout, Warehouse Automation with Handset and Conveyer Belt… 
• 
Increase Own Fleet delivery capacity from 200 orders/day to 800 orders/day with productivity 
of 25 drops/bike and 21 drops/truck 
• 
Decrease backlog and long pending orders from >5% to be below 1% within 1 month. 
• 
Selectively enable Same Day Delivery for Bangkok and Next Day Delivery for some clients. 
• 
Bring cost/order down by 15% in Q1 2016, compared to Q4 2015. 
Apr 2015 – Nov 2015 
Senior Logistics Associate 
LAZADA SINGAPORE 
Manage 3PL’s performance on Pickup and Delivery on a daily, weekly and monthly basis. 
Establish, develop and managing own fleet delivery with appropriate human resources and cost 
balance. Collaborate with Marketplace Operations team and Partner Support team to provide 
customer the best experience while buying at Lazada. Work with regional office on new projects 
to enhance delivery service (Same Day Delivery, N+1 Delivery, 3PL API Connection, Network 
Intelligence, Differentiated Shipping Options...). Support Warehouse on new projects (Warehouse 
Move, Return SOP, Postal Delivery...) 
• 
Facilitated the successful development of Lazada Own Fleet Delivery (increase the 
contribution from <5% to >20% of Lazada volume). 
• 
Push delivery cost per parcel down by 250% for Own Fleet Delivery and 20% for 3PL 
delivery. 
• 
Successfully manage to roll-out Same Day Delivery and Postal Delivery ontime with high 
customer satisfaction (Net Promoter Score >85%). 
• 
Drive Network Intelligence projects - getting more status from 3PLs’ systems to provide 
customer transparency on the delivery (getting 40% of statuses from 3PL systems). 
Mar 2013 – Mar 2015 
Logistics Development Manager 
LAZADA VIETNAM 
Develop Lazada Own Fleet delivery with more hub opening, franchising, pickup routing, mobile 
application and implement Logistics Management System (LMS). Creating and develop 3PL 
management, including building KPIs, SOP for managing 3PL’s performance, status updates and 
cost control. Support Logistics Directors and COO with strategic planning and analysis. 
Collaborate with Warehouse team with cost driven projects (new packaging materials and box 
sizes, new warehouse movement, universal airway bill implementation...). Work with regional 
office on new projects to enhance delivery service (Express Delivery, Promised Leadtime, 3PL 
API Connection, Network Intelligence, Vendor Management Squad...) 
• 
Successfully manage the development of Lazada Own Fleet Delivery (with 20 delivery Hubs 
in 13 cities, 200 drivers, 30 trucks, cover 75% of Vietnam and account for 45% of Lazada 
volume) with competitive cost. 
• 
Drive new packaging material and box sizes project to save 100mil VND delivery cost every 
month. 
• 
Contribute to the fast development of warehouse (move from 3,000 m2 warehouse to a 7,000 
m2 warehouse with regional blueprint applied). 
• 
Establish and monitor 3PL API connection with all logistics companies including state-owned 
companies like VNPost and Viettel. 
• 
Provide Express Delivery for main cities (Ho Chi Minh and Ha Noi) with high customer 
satisfaction. 
Apr 2012 – Dec 2012 
Assistant Distribution Development Manager 
MICHELIN VIETNAM 
Assist DDM on managing sales report of retailers and wholesalers. Create and maintain daily, 
weekly and monthly KPIs for sales team. Calculate bonus for merchants, conduct market analysis 
and competitor evaluation. Support DDM on preparing monthly reports for regional director 
Education 
Foreign Trade University Ho Chi Minh City Campus 
Major: International Business Administration
